rev.comment: /* Personal life */
/* Personal life */ - fix another of one of Andy's lazy refs. Make some kind of an effort, dear boy. Probably another case of over-referencing anyway.
fix foreign language link redirect
/* Personal life */ Sun-Times is a RS, Bobblehead is not.
lecturer is technically correct
robot Adding: [[ms:Barack Hussein Obama]]
duplicate link cleanup.
/* Controversial Comments */ Rmv new section. I agree this stuff should be included, but it would be better in the section on his image. He is being accused of "elitism" for these remarks.
/* Controversial Comments */
I started a controversial section. I started it with a quote that is sturring up media attention that he addmitted to saying and has appoligized for. I used Associated Press sources for this quote.
Remove some overlinks.
[[WP:UNDO|Undid]] revision 205223893 by [[Special:Contributions/Andyvphil|Andyvphil]] ([[User talk:Andyvphil|talk]]) Charges are not related to Obama.
/* Personal life */ "Prosecutors say Rezko ordered a business associate to use part of a kickback as a contribution to Obama's U.S. Senate campaign."
/* Presidential campaign */ Restore Lanny Davis, who is not redundant of Kristol. "Brief" is misleading and uncited.
/* Presidential campaign */ add in AIDS wikilink, in quote contrary to mosquote, as a special circumstance. feel free to move to 'assertion that' if unhappy with placement
/* Senate campaign */ [[WP:OVERLINK]]ing, attn needed to this sea of blue that doesn't increase our understanding, don't we all know what a Treasurer and millionaire are ?
ref errors, [[WP:MOSNUM]] issues still (I listed this on the FAR), and [[WP:OVERLINK]]ing still, U.S. Military link, for example, adds nothing to this article
/* Political advocacy */ samples only, fixes needed throughout, these are not news sources, and work italicizes, this is incorrect italics per [[WP:ITALICS]], fix throughout needed
/* 109th Congress */ [[WP:PUNC]], this little stuff should be cleaned up by now, review and check throughout
/* Political advocacy */ having another look, pls review the MOS list I left on the FAR, MoS issues should be cleaned up by now
/* Presidential campaign */ four references is a bit much for half a sentence. Politico article doesn't really mention Obama not cutting ties with Wright, WSJ editorial is redundant to NY Times.
/* Presidential campaign */ - add "brief" (see talk archive) and fix Andy's lazy ref from Lanny Davis (which arguably shouldn't be in here at all since he's a declared Clinton supporter)
/* Presidential campaign */ "offensive"? Some, to some, certainly. But "offensive" is not a NPOV factual assertion, to be made in Wikipedia's voice.
/* Presidential campaign */ "temporary"?
/* Presidential campaign */ Add Lanny Davis to Kristol example
reverting: if we mention "God damn America" we'd need to provide more context, per NPOV. "Including" implies that we're not giving all the details here. See talk.
/* Presidential campaign */ best to include the facts
/* Early life and private career */ changing "over $250,000" to "up to $250,000" per talk page

/* Presidential campaign */ rm unneeded comma
/* Presidential campaign */ need a third-party citation for Obama's mentions of Wright as Marine and service to poor; Peggy Noonan will do nicely
/* Presidential campaign */ more appropriate context for this. (Wright also served in the Navy, but Obama mentioned only the Marines in his speech.)
/* Presidential campaign */ I think that "attempted to" is unnecessary — structurally, that's what the speech did. People can disagree on whether that context is relevant or sufficient.
/* Presidential campaign */ I think it's worth noting that it was excerpted soundbites from the sermons which started the uproar, not the entire sermons.
/* Presidential campaign */ Obama's secret service codename isn't really important, is it?
/* Presidential campaign */ actually, the speech didn't have much to say about the context of the specific comments; it was more about the anger which underlay them.
/* Early life and private career */ Rezko's charges are NOT related to his political contributions.
/* Presidential campaign */ shift to using actual quote marks instead of plagiarizing. Leave out link to the conspiracy article per [[WP:MOSQUOTE]]
/* Presidential campaign */ taking Frederick Douglass out; will discuss on talk
/* Early life and private career */ remove unnecessary {{details}} (that's what links are for), and clarify that Rezko's trial is unrelated to Obama
/* Wright controversy */ Remove [[WP:UNDUE|undue weight]]. Seek consensus on talk page
